str2: Now, just now, at this moment. Adverb from a derivative of airo through the idea of suspension; just now.

str2: A primary verb; to convince; by analogy, to pacify or conciliate; reflexively or passively, to assent, to rely.

str2: To seek, search for, desire, require, demand. Of uncertain affinity; to seek; specially, to worship, or to plot.

str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
